text: Aby is a name that is similar to Abby, and it is derived from Abigail, which is a name that can be shortened to Abby. Abigail originates from Hebrew and its meaning is "my father's joy" or "source of joy." Aby can also be a nickname for Abraham, which is another Hebrew name meaning "father of many nations." == People == * Aby Gartmann (1930–2018), Swiss bobsledder * Aby Maraño (born 1992), Filipino volleyball player * Aby Warburg (1866–1929), German art historian and cultural theorist ==References== Category:Names
title: Aby (name)
